product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner is designed with a soft pink diagonal gradient background, subtly enhanced by geometric overlays and delicate sparkle illustrations. The layout is left-aligned with a luxurious high-contrast heading section consisting of two bold text layers — "heading_1" and "heading_2" — emphasizing sophistication and impact. Beneath them sits a refined "subheading" layer in a slightly smaller and more stylish font. The "description" text layer provides attractive product highlights in an italicized font, adding a touch of finesse. Prominently displayed near the center is the product image ("product_image"), bordered on the left by the bold price ("price") and vibrant call-to-action button ("cta_button" with "cta" text).

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Plum: #4A2932 (Headings, price)
- Rosewood: #8B4559 (Subheading)
- Muted Burgundy: #663344 (Product description)
- Brave Pink: #C2185B (CTA button)
- White: #FFFFFF (CTA text)
- Background Gradient: #F8D7DA → #F5C2C7 → #FFF0F3 → #FFEBEE
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings featuring a harmonious combination of rose gold and brilliant white stones. The dominant color is a soft, metallic **rose gold (#F7C6C7)** that outlines the structure and creates a luxurious, feminine appeal. The embedded **crystal white diamonds (#FFFFFF)** and **transparent icy silver (#E1E1E1)** stones contrast beautifully with the warmth of the rose gold, enhancing sparkle and brilliance. These colors are seamlessly blended, with rose gold framing the stones, allowing the clear, faceted gems to catch light and become highlighted. The overall palette is both sophisticated and soft, ideal for a romantic, classy advertisement banner.
